languages.text: "Ты такой романтик, Соломон. Откуда у тебя такие опыт и уверенность в сердечных делах?"

traits.locale_text: я вижу ты прямо эксперт по подкатам

languages.text: "You are such a romantic, Solomorne. Where did you acquire such experience and self-assurance in matters of the heart?"
languages.original_text: "Ты такой романтик, Соломон. Откуда у тебя такие опыт и уверенность в сердечных делах?"

traits.locale_text: "You are such a romantic, Solomorne. Where did you acquire such experience and self-assurance in matters of the heart?"
"You are such a romantic, Solomorne. Where did you acquire such experience and self-assurance in matters of the heart?"
"You are such a romantic, Solomorne. Where did you acquire such experience and self-assurance in matters of the heart?"
"You are such a romantic, Solomorne. Where did you acquire such experience and self-assurance in matters of the heart?"
"You are such a romantic, Solomorne. Where did you acquire such experience and self-assurance in matters of the heart?"

languages.text: 「ソロモーン、君は本当にロマンチストだな。そんな恋愛経験と自信を、一体どこで身につけたんだ？」
languages.original_text: "You are such a romantic, Solomorne. Where did you acquire such experience and self-assurance in matters of the heart?"

traits.locale_text: 「ソロモーン、君は本当にロマンチストだな。そんな恋愛経験と自信を、一体どこで身につけたんだ？」

languages.text: "Ihr seid ein richtiger Romantiker, Solomorne. Woher habt Ihr diese Erfahrung und Selbstsicherheit in Herzensangelegenheiten?"
languages.original_text: "You are such a romantic, Solomorne. Where did you acquire such experience and self-assurance in matters of the heart?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid ein richtiger Romantiker, Solomorne. Woher habt Ihr diese Erfahrung und Selbstsicherheit in Herzensangelegenheiten?"

languages.text: « Vous êtes un grand romantique, Solomorne. Où avez-vous acquis autant d'expérience et d'assurance dans les affaires de cœur ? »
languages.original_text: "You are such a romantic, Solomorne. Where did you acquire such experience and self-assurance in matters of the heart?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes un grand romantique, Solomorne. Où avez-vous acquis autant d'expérience et d'assurance dans les affaires de cœur ? »

languages.text: «Es usted un romántico, Solomorne. ¿Dónde ha adquirido tal experiencia y confianza en los asuntos del corazón?».
languages.original_text: "You are such a romantic, Solomorne. Where did you acquire such experience and self-assurance in matters of the heart?"

traits.locale_text: «Es usted un romántico, Solomorne. ¿Dónde ha adquirido tal experiencia y confianza en los asuntos del corazón?».

languages.text: “你可真懂浪漫，索罗蒙。你对感情方面的问题充满信心，这么丰富的感情经验，你是怎么积累出来的？”
languages.original_text: "You are such a romantic, Solomorne. Where did you acquire such experience and self-assurance in matters of the heart?"

traits.locale_text: “你可真懂浪漫，索罗蒙。你对感情方面的问题充满信心，这么丰富的感情经验，你是怎么积累出来的？”

languages.text: "Ne kadar romantiksin Solomorne. Bu yürek meselelerindeki tecrüben ve itimadın nereden geliyor?"
languages.original_text: "You are such a romantic, Solomorne. Where did you acquire such experience and self-assurance in matters of the heart?"

traits.locale_text: "Ne kadar romantiksin Solomorne. Bu kalbî meselelerdeki tecrüben ve itimadın nereden geliyor?"
